review: A welll-oiled cinematic machine that runs on spectacle and Tom Cruise’s charisma.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: A Hollywood sequel that improves upon its predecessor in every conceivable way.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: The summer blockbuster season is set to kick off with a (super sonic) boom with the arrival of Top Gun: Maverick, a film which builds on the legacy of Top Gun and surpasses it on every level.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick is set in a world where if you want something enough, it will happen. If you want to fly that plane at mach 10, you just have to be enough of a badass. Physics doesn’t come into it. The world is pliable, susceptible to your wishes.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: 'Top Gun: Maverick' overachieves on every level, within a running time which flies by too quickly. Everything people are saying is true, everything others have written should be believed, because blockbusters are back.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Cruise takes to the skies once again and pushes the limits of what a blockbuster can be, giving audiences a front seat in the cockpit to witness the adrenaline-pumping action first hand.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Scene for scene, it’s a better time than Top Gun. More nimble, more exciting, more soulful.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: It’s impossible to overstate how dramatically inert Top Gun: Maverick is.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: From a ground-level perspective, Maverick, directed by Joseph Kosinski, is a game of two halves... It’s lucky that the flying is so plentiful and overwhelming, because the ground-based action is somewhat less dynamic.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: A huge triumph, one combines the right amount of reverence for the source material, homage, and fan service, with modernization, new ideas, and improvement on the original’s weaknesses.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick has all the ingredients of a perfect summer movie. A sequel full of nostalgia, emotion and adrenaline. [Full Review in Spanish]

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Visceral action sequences ensue... but the absence of a challenging or interesting story, never mind a challenging or interesting performance on man of the hour Cruise’s part, are glaring omissions.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick is an event film that will remind many of why they love going to The Movies. It's as perfect a summer blockbuster as you can hope for.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: The plain fact is that “Top Gun: Maverick” works.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: A triumph in every sense of the word and a reminder of the stupendous joy blockbuster films should bring to our lives.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: A thrilling, catch-your-breath action blockbuster that dazzles with its weighty, daredevil aerial sequences, actual emotional stakes and a charm-laden performance from Cruise that reminds everyone why he is one of the remaining bona fide movie stars.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: 'Maverick' is an absurdity masking several horrors, chief among them the continued indulgence of Cruise’s virile death wish, which for me nullifies any pleasure reaped from his present-day status as The Last Movie Star™.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Maverick is essentially the epitome of the big screen blockbuster bringing with it all the fist-pumping adrenaline, death-defying in-camera dog-fighting and all the feels we all need and deserve from a 2022 Top Gun.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: While Top Gun: Maverick is an enjoyable flight of fancy, especially considering its predecessor plays like the crust of a story whose center somehow vanished, this is among the classier examples of nostalgia porn we’ve yet to see.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: In many ways, this is a stupidly entertaining movie. Intellectually, I suspect I really shouldn’t like this movie so much, but we all need a little more whoosh in our lives.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: a muscle-flexing statement of intent from Cruise's Hollywood military-industrial complex

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Cruise's flight of fancy soars with blast of nostalgia, unapologetically resuscitating the past while reflecting on what's gone by. Aerial scenes are excellent, a throwback that still climbs with massive Gs. Big, fun, cinematic popcorn poetry.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: ...pathetically pandering or deeply satisfying, depending on your relationship to the original movie.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: A sentimental stroll through 1986’s “Top Gun” — a sentimental stroll at Mach whatever, pulling seven, eight or nine “G’s” along the way.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Speed is one thing. Clarity is another. “Top Gun: Maverick” has both.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: The film undoubtedly knows what its fans will embrace, and its successes in this regard outshine its accomplishments as art or mere blockbuster entertainment.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick is a sequel that capably manages to erase any longstanding skepticism. The film is not only a reverent love story of aviation but also represents a type of filmmaking that has nearly gone out of style.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Entertaining, intense, and surprisingly rich with emotion, "Top Gun: Maverick" is the perfect summer movie.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: The protagonists discuss two miracles for a successful mission. Here’s a third; a 36-year later Top Gun sequel is a must-see, unbelievably thrilling stunner with absorbing character work. Maybe Joseph Kosinski will be Tom Cruise’s miracle worker anytime

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: "Maverick" doesn't have to do much to improve on the 1986 film, but Kosinksi makes a noticeable effort to give the brand name some sensitivity this time around, though he does much better when focused on offering viewers a thrill ride.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: High art? Never. Unrivaled action movie? You bet your ass.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: ... Owes all its charm to Cruise's indelible charisma. He is the real special effect of the film. [Full review in Spanish]

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: When the film stops the nostalgic shenanigans, it takes flight. [Full review in Spanish]

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review:
…isn't only better than the original, it is the quintessential Tom Cruise movie,
the best we can expect from a movie preordained to be a summer blockbuster.  Is it perfect?  No.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Overall, Top Gun: Maverick gives audiences more of what they loved in the first film without following its predecessor step by step. Top Gun: Maverick carves out a path all its own with exhilarating action and a marvelous cast.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Those sequences up in the fighters are truly the kind of immersive, mind-blowing filmmaking that cinema was made for.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: “Top Gun: Maverick” is everything a fan could hope for. It is exciting, it is endearing, it just about blows kisses at the fans, and it is guaranteed to make many new ones.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: A rousing, exhilarating and crowd-pleasing spectacle.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: … a heart-racing and heart-breaking ride …

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review:
Excellent balance between nostalgia, the unspoken past of these last few decades, and a renewed future. 
[Full review in Spanish]

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick is an extremely enjoyable thrill ride, yet its focus on intense, immersive action doesn’t allow much room for lighter, steamier fun like its predecessor.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick feels like the first big-screen must-see film this side of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: If you’re comfortable seeing a movie theatrically, find the theater closest to you with the biggest screen, crispest sound, and prepare to have your face melted off. Top Gun: Maverick is a triumph.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Tom Cruise knows exactly what his audience wants out of him as a movie star, actor, and the legacy of these characters. It sets the bar extremely high for the other big summer movies coming ahead.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: It's not quite as perfect as other critics have stated, but it is the decade's first summer blockbuster likely to leave you exhilarated by the end.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: It’s a nostalgia trip that understands that’s why you’re there but also utilizes that as its own ammunition to create something better. Not through subversion, but enhancement.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick has joined the elite — sequels that both surpass their predecessors yet pay tribute to them. Follow-ups are a regular part of our cinematic diet but now we have the game-changer we’ve been waiting for. This is how it’s done.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Not only is it a sequel that marginally soars past its predecessor at Mach Speed, but is a thematically compelling and mature character study that naturally wrings a few tears out of you.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick hits its target with explosive force.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: It's loud, sometimes silly, often crazy. But in the end, the moral of the heart-stopping story is clear: Tom Cruise is a rootin'-tootin' hero.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Tom Cruise’s tour de force offers a pulsating ride well worth the 36-year wait.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Joseph Kosinski does a more-than-capable job of ensuring that Top Gun die-hards will laugh at the jokes, cry with the characters, and gasp at every skybound maneuver. But this is very much a Tom Cruise Picture, and don’t you forget it.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Without Tom Cruise's say-so, this film wouldn't have got made. That's as it should be, because from start to finish he dominates this amiably silly, winningly nostalgic action romp, filling a huge canvas with his formidable star power.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Essentially, this franchise has lost that loving feeling. And with it gone (gone, gone), so too is a bit of the thrill.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: "Maverick" is the perfect wingman to "Top Gun" and a more than worthy successor to a classic. It flies so high it soars.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick hits all the highlights and then some: Micky-mouse-eared deck-hands doing cat-shot dance moves; warplanes screaming off carrier decks; arrogant stick jockeys; beach volleyball; flat spins; and dogfight mayhem in the skies. Outstanding!

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review:
Plays it safe.
[Full review in Spanish]

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: An implausible and forgettable retread of the original 1986 Top Gun.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Maverick is both the perfect summer blockbuster and a masterclass in crowd-pleasing moviemaking. It’s the kind of edge-of-your-seat, fist-pumping, adrenaline rush of a spectacle that will gratify every one of your brain’s pleasure centres.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: A summer spectacular that proves that there’s still life left in the old ways, all while stoking, and satisfying, that familiar need for speed.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: You’ll laugh, you’ll cry, you’ll gasp and your heart will race.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: I felt like i was in a jet in the air. It feels so much more visceral, so much faster, so much more dangerous.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Tom Cruise revisits his eighties glory in a spectacular sequel. Top Gun: Maverick tells a thrilling new story while capturing the jet-fueled spirit of the classic original. The film boldly embraces practical visual effects in an era defined by CGI.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick is an uninspired, outdated retread of 1986’s Top Gun, but with more implausible scenarios and with no women in military leadership positions ... Top Gun: Maverick, just like its main character, is stuck in a rut of reliving past glories.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick is a blistering piece of pop art, an all-timer Dad movie stealth masterpiece, and maybe the ultimate legacy sequel.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: I folded my arms and prepared for the worst. Two hours later, I was scribbling down words like “Whoa!”, “Exciting!” and “Bullseye!!”

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: A much better film than its predecessor was, and much better than it needs to be overall.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Tom Cruise has given us all a proud, defiant Dad Movie for men in their 50s. It's a reasonably effective action movie with reasonably exciting dogfights that sends you home going, "Well, that was exactly what I expected."

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: THE summer blockbuster: feel-good, action-packed, funny, romantic, exciting, non-superhero theater draw that we've all been waiting for. It's perfect for the whole family, and couples of all ages. Welcome back to the movies.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: With music by Lady Gaga and Hans Zimmer, action scenes tailor-made for hulking IMAX screens, and Cruise flaunting it in a white naval uniform, it’s Top Gun dialled up to Mach 10.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: The conflict between two pilots remains intact, and the veterans who teach Cruise secrets about life and responsibility return... [Full review in Spanish]

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: The best legacy sequel to a single movie. One still can debate Creed, Cobra Kai or The Force Awakens, but each had entire franchises upon which to draw.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Maverick is not the type of movie you wait around for until it’s on cable: It’s an adrenaline-pumping event worth getting off the La-Z-Boy to experience.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: It makes the act of being a good movie look like the easiest thing in the world, with director Joseph Kosinski showing off everything he's got.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: See it on the biggest screen possible. Then see it again.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: This is a worthy, often exemplary follow-up to the 1986 classic. It’s everything a summer movie should be.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Somehow, "Maverick" manages to recycle those latter beats -- with an exceptionally well cast class of new pilots -- and still feel contemporary, all while approximating the old-fashioned virtues of the kind of movies that flourished in the '80s .

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Satisfying sequel hits nearly all the marks while outdoing the original.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: More grown-up, more generous, and more lighthearted.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun 2 reboots the original film's heart-pounding aerial action, infectiously cheesy character drama and don't-think-too-hard-about-it military fetishism in a winning spectacle of cinematic escapism.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Tom Cruise's 'Top Gun: Maverick' is an audio/visual treat and generally well-made summer blockbuster even as it becomes a 'Rise Of Skywalker'-style nostalgic ode to itself.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Overall, a stunning piece of filmmaking and the perfect summer blockbuster for Memorial Day Weekend. Cruise, Kosinski & McQuarrie manage to recreate the feel of the original film while also updating it with a very modern - and thrilling - third act.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: A breathless, gravity and logic-defying sequel.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: From beginning to end, there was nothing that happened that I could not anticipate, either in the flow of storytelling or from the idea of the movie I had before I sat down in a movie theater.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Like its eponymous ace, it’s a dying breed, but there’s no way it’s going out in gasps or sputters. Not while Tom Cruise still draws breath.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: “Top Gun: Maverick,” a film that, thanks to advances in modern technology, outstrips its predecessor in nearly every capacity. The dogfights are breathtaking, the action sequences ungodly, and the need for speed is more urgent than ever.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: The ultimate Gen X Dad fantasy, in which a 50-something gets to outsmart and outperform the younger generation’s best and brightest.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick is the definition of an exciting summer blockbuster.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Is 'Top Gun: Maverick' the movie that will mark a generation? No. Its predecessor will always hold that title. Is it a fun Hollywood film? Absolutely. Does it have substance? Not really.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick is pure movie magic that accomplishes the rare feat of improving upon the original.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: A textbook example of how to make a sequel.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: If this doesn't bring people back to theaters, nothing will.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Welcome back to the Military Industrial Oedipal Complex.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: This cinematic spectacle starts by paying homage to the original movie — with the notes of the “Top Gun Anthem” — and it never stops. If you liked Top Gun, you’ll enjoy Top Gun: Maverick thoroughly. All the ingredients of the original movie are there.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: What's not to love about a one of the greatest movie stars of all time refusing to be grounded and, instead, fully embracing the effects-driven era as his own? (Maybe the rotten script, but still)

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Teller and Powell are breezily appealing, actors at the apex of their youth and beauty, though the movie still belongs in almost every scene to Cruise.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Kosinski and co deliver all the Top Gun feels and then some: slick visuals, crew camaraderie, thrilling aerial action, a surprising emotional wallop and, in Tom Cruise, a magnetic movie-star performance as comforting as an old leather jacket.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: It’s a fresh-faced gloss on the original... powered, like the original, by a star who’ll simply never stop being a star.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Now I want to see [Cruise] take on a sequel to Risky Business and do the underpants dance again.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Ridiculous and often ridiculously entertaining...

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Like Maverick implores his pilots, you think in this world, you're dead. 'Top Gun: Maverick' requires you to let go of good taste and instead enjoy the flight into fantasy. If that happens, it'll take your breath away.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: One of the greatest, oft-overlooked skills [Tom Cruise] has developed over his decade-spanning career is how to internalize the weight of time, a factor crucial to Top Gun: Maverick’s ethos.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: In short, Top Gun: Maverick is the most fun I’ve had watching a big dumb Hollywood blockbuster for a while.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick is good ol' cheesy as hell, silly-heroic entertainment with mile-high enthusiasm — a welcome throwback to simpler cinematic times.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: The sequel follows the original beat for beat, to a degree that’s almost comical. And yet, as formulaic as it is, there’s no denying that it delivers in terms of both nostalgia and reinvention.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: An expertly crafted, thunderously enjoyable and surprisingly emotional blockbuster.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick is as thrilling as blockbusters get.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Tops the original in every way imaginable, from an all-knowing performance for the ages from Cruise to its highly emotional storyline, “take my breath away” aerial sequences and just about anything else you want from a studio blockbuster.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick isn’t just one of the best blockbusters of the year – it’s one of the best sequels of all time.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: In the vacuum of Maverick’s 130 minute run, a disarming wistfulness, and a friendliness, give interesting shape to what could have been mere pointless rehash.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun Maverick has everything you want from a sequel and still works as a standalone film – a miraculous feat, achieved.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: It’s crammed with images you didn’t know you were desperate to see until the second you see them.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Kosinski may not be able to match Tony Scott’s formalist bravado, but he makes up for it with speed, clarity, and a moral imperative to push the limits of what seems possible.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Tom Cruise is back in the cockpit and we’re all the better for it; Top Gun: Maverick is the definitive blockbuster of our times.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Whether you’re feeling the need for speed for the first time or haven’t lost that loving feeling since '86, the Danger Zone is still a pretty spectacular place to visit.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Turns out we need Maverick now more than ever.  optional screen reader

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick is a rare sequel that is not only better than the original but retroactively makes Top Gun's story altogether deeper.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: If you haven’t been to the movies in a while, “Top Gun: Maverick” is a way to get back in. It’s pretty much what “going to the movies” is all about.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick is what you want out of big-budget summer blockbusters with insane cinematography and directing that you're going to feel like you're in the cockpit of a fighter plane.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: This lega-sequel builds on the groundwork laid by its predecessor, delivering riveting character drive as well as breathtaking, big screen Movie Moments. The new crew fuses the past with the present, making it a poignant, powerfully potent thrill ride.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: A thrilling big-screen experience that would do Tony Scott proud. Worth the very long wait.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Sumptuous in its visual splendour and awe-inspiring in execution, it is unlike anything we have seen before, Top Gun: Maverick is the most exhilarating and spectacular blockbusters of its kind.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: The film is the rare sequel that outdoes the original in every way, delivering the ultimate theatrical experience that will have audiences convinced they've just hit crossed Mach 5 themselves.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick improves upon the original in every conceivable way, and does so in a way that might make this one of the greatest sequels ever made.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: It’s been a long time since I’ve seen a movie that made me think “How did they do that?”

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Tom Cruise Takes Audiences On A Satisfying Trip Back To The Danger Zone.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: It’s rare when a sequel not only fully exceeds expectations but, at least to me, is just so much better than its predecessor, and that’s the case with Maverick.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick is so much better than it arguably has any right to be. One of the year’s best films so far, it’s a sequel that’s an improvement upon the original in nearly every manner.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun Maverick is the definition of “they don’t make them like this anymore." A throwback to when summer blockbusters mattered; the perfect mix of heart, spectacle, and action.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick took my breath away. An adrenaline rush tailor-made for the summer blockbuster season. It gives cinephiles jaw-dropping aerial combat sequences, and packs an emotional punch that makes Top Gun: Maverick the event of the summer.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: You will want to high five someone on the way out.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Much like Ethan Hunt in the Mission: Impossible movies, Cruise embodies the character of Maverick with all his bravado, insecurities and skeletons.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: It's a triumphant example of blockbuster filmmaking, proving that there are still boundaries to be pushed and elements from the past worth preserving.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: The movie has visceral thrills, massive peril, hard-fought and earned victories, but also captivating romance, searing drama, big emotional stakes, heart, soul, and poignant pathos.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: Top Gun: Maverick is the must-see cinematic experience of the year! Packed with jaw-dropping aerial sequences, genuine heart, and one of the best performances of Tom Cruise's career, this is the theatrical experience you've been waiting for.

name: Top Gun: Maverick
review: The film fully surrenders to the grandiose fun that’s marked the best of Tom Cruise’s recent star vehicles and reaffirms Joseph Kosinski as a blockbuster craftsman par excellence.
